title: Saisher
author: Saisher
created_time: October 06, 2022, 09:59:09 PMLast edit: October 14, 2022, 10:18:15 PM by Saisher
content: I am active on this project since 2014 yes the site already exists since 2014 but they just release their own token for their hundreds of thousands of followers, you can earn points by following, liking tweeting, and following social media accounts, and those points can be converter to their own token after a month through their airdrop system, the more active you are the more chances of getting more of their tokens through their monthly airdrop.You can also use these points if you don't want to convert them to their own token to gain more followers and likes for your social media account, or you can sell them to their own marketplace.The token is already in Coinmarketcap in Pancakeswap go check it out  https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/addmefast/They have a referral program but I opted to post it here without a referral link.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: The feature is good but the volume of token isn't. I've seen the same websites that has that type of tasks and they allow their users to earn $. Well, that was before and it's really clicking those people that are looking to collect earn a little bit from doing those simple tasks. But having that earn with their token, I doubt it that will increase the traffic and volume of their token. Although they've been there for so long but if lacks of innovation and upgrades, they'll be left behind. A whole volume for them since the last 24 hours is just $1.6k, too low.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on October 07, 2022, 11:07:24 AMThe feature is good but the volume of token isn't. I've seen the same websites that has that type of tasks and they allow their users to earn $. Well, that was before and it's really clicking those people that are looking to collect earn a little bit from doing those simple tasks. But having that earn with their token, I doubt it that will increase the traffic and volume of their token. Although they've been there for so long but if lacks of innovation and upgrades, they'll be left behind. A whole volume for them since the last 24 hours is just $1.6k, too low.The strong point is their platform, they have been online for so many years and have served millions of social media accounts, its the easy way to increase your media presence and increase your followers, this alone is their strong point, the token since it's new will not take the market by storm, old members can see an increase in memberships and activity by 1000% since the launch their token, we never know its profitability in the future but so far the platform is proven to deliver results.

comments.author: Oceat
comments.body: Another token that will easily be exploited by the spammers of bots and I doubt you will be earning enough profit on this with the size of that volume. I find it a complete waste of time but for the others if they want to gain more followers and also wanted to earn some token it's suit them but just like I said, you will need to work more on this.Btw, isn't buying followers are the same just like this? Idk if that's true but mostly of the famous influencers account's followers are like bots.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Not so good for investors who are looking for utility. Yes its nice but think about the purpose of their platform. It can help users to earn free tokens by engaging on social media but does investors would be interested in thatvkind of service? Maybe for hype it can be but in the long run, only few would be interested with it. There are better ways to earn but associating with a token, usually its not stay for long. Ive seen other platforms like this and end up dying.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: honestly I've heard of this site and but I didn't know they released tokens, it seems I've created an account here but forgot what email I used at that time, I might access my account again there if I remember it, hopefully I get a free token there or I can find free money, thank you for sharing that information here, the price is still fairly cheap but there's nothing wrong with saving their tokens to add assets to my wallet

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Judging from the UI of the website, it looks like this project is not promising. Also the $AMF token has no utility. Can $AMF tokens be converted to AMF points? Because that's the only one that will be a utility in this project (nothing else). I've also seen $AMF Volume on Pancakeswap, only around $1.6K. With such a small volume and people constantly getting tokens, that would really put this project to death.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on October 07, 2022, 02:28:06 PMJudging from the UI of the website, it looks like this project is not promising. Also the $AMF token has no utility. Can $AMF tokens be converted to AMF points? Because that's the only one that will be a utility in this project (nothing else). I've also seen $AMF Volume on Pancakeswap, only around $1.6K. With such a small volume and people constantly getting tokens, that would really put this project to death.Just is because it was listed in Pancakeswap but what if it was listed in Binance? I'm not going to assure you that this project is valuable and will stay longer but never I think also that it was promising, I was neutral about this. However, as long as it gives profit to the investors, I believe this will gain more investors and trust. Well, it is our own decision anyway. Besides, crypto is risky and so choosing altcoins and was not wrong trying to put some into the project that we think there is ROI.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: I was surprised that I can’t visit directly the website when I click the link you provided so I check your BBCode. You don’t need to enter URL value if you enclosing a link with URL BBcode. You can simply use the code below to provide a direct link. I link this kind of website since it’s like theviralexchange before that rewards user there token for completing social media task. I’m not updated anymore on what kind of new feature they add to there service but this is good for bounty hunters that wants a sure profit for there social media task done.Code:[url]https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/addmefast/[/url]

comments.author: evichi
comments.body: With the platform being online since 2014, it means they already have membership in the platform. However, since the platform just launched their token, it will need time to grow. IMO, for the platform to grow fast, they will heed to introduce more use cases for the token such as staking, trading it in more exchanges, etc. that will benefit users. They have the advantage of good followership, so they have more chances of members keying into such projects which will eventually earn more value for the token as well as members of the platform.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on October 07, 2022, 02:28:06 PMJudging from the UI of the website, it looks like this project is not promising. Also the $AMF token has no utility. Can $AMF tokens be converted to AMF points? Because that's the only one that will be a utility in this project (nothing else). I've also seen $AMF Volume on Pancakeswap, only around $1.6K. With such a small volume and people constantly getting tokens, that would really put this project to death.You just need to explore the site first before judging how the thing is being worked out here, the platform is already 8 years, its one of the pioneers in this niche, marketers can relate to how this site works, if you're not a social media marketer you will not have a grasp on how this platform works if the project will die it would have died long ago but 8 years with additional members of 20k better check the stat first before judging, but I'm not trying to hype the project but invest what you can afford to lose applies here and to every token.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Honestly the website looks more like a GPT (get paid to) website where users can perform certain tasks and get paid for that. We have seen hundreds of social media tokens died already so I am not sure what extra it is bringing in to be honest. Nothing extraordinary! Probably another soon-to-be-died token platform without much vision to generate a serious revenue stream. This kind of websites are not too popular nowadays.

I'm not going to assure you that this project is valuable and will stay longer but never I think also that it was promising, I was neutral about this. Before giving feedback, it's a good idea to do your research first so you know what I mean.Quote from: Saisher on October 07, 2022, 03:13:05 PMYou just need to explore the site first before judging how the thing is being worked out here, the platform is already 8 years, its one of the pioneers in this niche, marketers can relate to how this site works, if you're not a social media marketer you will not have a grasp on how this platform works if the project will die it would have died long ago but 8 years with additional members of 20k better check the stat first before judging, but I'm not trying to hype the project but invest what you can afford to lose applies here and to every token.  I fully understand how this platform works, my friend, this is no different from a traffic exchange platform that was hyped a few years ago. But here we are talking about crypto and also the advantages of it.With very small volume and poor utility, I think this project will be stuck only as a platform for exchanging traffic, it is impossible for investors to benefit from this, because the ecosystem and utility are very limited.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: To earn crypto through our social medias is a very interesting concept which has already been a mean of extra income for many members on this forum and in crypto world as a whole. However, we must calculate if such offers worth, because just like bounty campaigns, you might be being paid in thin air for your promoting job.Personally, I think payments for such tasks should be made in btc or a solid altcoin which we know their real value. It's strange they have to create their own token to pay users, besides being unnecessary.But since you said they are alive and operating for 8 years already, may I ask how much have you profited with this site so far? And how much is it possible to make in a daily basis?

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on October 07, 2022, 11:16:39 AMQuote from: blockman on October 07, 2022, 11:07:24 AMThe feature is good but the volume of token isn't. I've seen the same websites that has that type of tasks and they allow their users to earn $. Well, that was before and it's really clicking those people that are looking to collect earn a little bit from doing those simple tasks. But having that earn with their token, I doubt it that will increase the traffic and volume of their token. Although they've been there for so long but if lacks of innovation and upgrades, they'll be left behind. A whole volume for them since the last 24 hours is just $1.6k, too low.The strong point is their platform, they have been online for so many years and have served millions of social media accounts, its the easy way to increase your media presence and increase your followers, this alone is their strong point, the token since it's new will not take the market by storm, old members can see an increase in memberships and activity by 1000% since the launch their token, we never know its profitability in the future but so far the platform is proven to deliver results.Yes and I understand that business model they've got and as well as the feature that they're giving to their users. The platform may be that long already in presence but if it's about their token, they should have sticked to what they were before and just abandon the token that they've built.It's better that they've been there with what they have before and focused on it rather than blend it with some tokens in hope that the users will earn from it too and mostly, the owner of it.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on October 07, 2022, 02:28:06 PMJudging from the UI of the website, it looks like this project is not promising. Also the $AMF token has no utility. Can $AMF tokens be converted to AMF points? Because that's the only one that will be a utility in this project (nothing else). I've also seen $AMF Volume on Pancakeswap, only around $1.6K. With such a small volume and people constantly getting tokens, that would really put this project to death.This is a critical marketing for them, having that airdrop can really hurt the project considering the volume and wondering as well they are already here since 2014 and yet they are still on that level. Though the task is very easy and to those who wants to get more followers with their social media account then this can be a good project, but if you are into bounties or airdrop, I guess it’s not that worth it.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: This is very interesting but if the use of their own token is to reward those who grow their account on social media might not be a good idea since the use of the token is only to reward which makes me think that the token won't survived for long as the token itself has no utility as how I see it. I think they are trying to earn more with creating new token and also using it to reward which I think not a great way to put use of a token without creating it with uses.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Well if they aren't collecting any personal information then I'm down with this. However usually these types of projects collect any information that they can and just front a token that is not really valuable, and probably has a very mundane use case that will prove to be not its strong point when the time comes. If the token is shit and if the reward isn't great, why bother participating? But it's actually a great idea, just not my cup of tea perhaps.

comments.author: samcrypto
comments.body: Do you even need to connect your social media account with this one? Is the token worth the risk?These are the questions that you need to ask before you participate in an airdrop like this, they have been here in the market for a long time but the question is, why they are still not appreciated here and why they are still down in terms of value? People should need to be more careful with this one, though the reward is not that attractive but still be cautious.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on October 06, 2022, 09:59:09 PMThe token is already in Coinmarketcap in Pancakeswap go check it out  https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/addmefast/They have a referral program but I opted to post it here without a referral link. Your url link [url=http:// https: is bad and does not lead directly to the coinmarketcap site to display the token you mentioned. It took me to a search site and not to the token. The bad part is from the first http in your comment. You wrote http double with the first one not being the correct spelling. You only have to write just one.
